page.title: 12POPULATION IN LUGWARDINE
page.content: The number of people in this part of the parish is approx. 500, and because of the high cost of property and the predominance of bungalows, a high proportion of the people are retired professionals or businessmen. There are a few young couples with children - they are the young executives in middle management. This group has tended to buy and renovate the older properties. The people in employment work in the City or the County. None of the people are unemployed. Only St Mary's R.C. High School offers villagers part time employment - as cleaners or kitchen staff. The village shop employs 9 children to deliver papers. Some seasonal work is available on farms. Some younger wives do part time work often voluntary. They are not motivated by financial need.
